attributes.action: Immediately dismiss Richard Brunstrom from HM Contabulary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In December 2007 Brunstrom was widely reported for breaking in to N Wales police HQ. His actions were in clear breach of health and safety legislation. A short time later he appeared on the Today programme seemingly supporting the use of class A illegal drugs. This man is a disgrace to all honest, hard working police officers and brings the force into discredit and disrepute. He should be dismissed immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
